bill_title: consider certain goods when given as a prize through a redemption store as purchases for resale .

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to consider certain goods when given as a prize through a redemption store as purchases for resale . Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added to chapter 10-46: An arcade retailer's purchase of tangible personal property, to be provided to the retailer's customer as part of a permanent arcade redemption store, is a purchase for resale. For the purposes of this section, the term "arcade redemption store" means a part of the arcade retailer's business where a customer exchanges tickets or points for a prize.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
